metadata.title: USN-4583-1 -- PHP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain encrypt ciphers. An attacker could possibly use this issue to decrease security or cause incorrect encryption data. This issue only affected Ubuntu 18.04 LTS and Ubuntu 20.04 LTS.  (CVE-2020-7069)  It was discorevered that PHP incorrectly handled certain HTTP cookies. An attacker could possibly use this issue to forge cookie which is supposed to be secure. (CVE-2020-7070)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4583-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  php7.4-gd - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-readline - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-dba - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-common - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-json - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-xmlrpc - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-intl - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-phpdbg - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-ldap - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-soap - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-xsl - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-pgsql - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-pspell - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-zip - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-interbase - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-enchant - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-odbc - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4 - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-mbstring - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-imap - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-bz2 - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-cgi - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-bcmath - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-dev - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-curl - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-tidy - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-gmp - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-sqlite3 - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-fpm - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-sybase - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-cli - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 libphp7.4-embed - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 libapache2-mod-php7.4 - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-mysql - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-snmp - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-xml - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 php7.4-opcache - 7.4.3-4ubuntu2.4 No subscription required
